column5: Anyone tried salting minnows to preserve them for later use or for places where live baits are not allowed?  What's the best way to go about?  Any suggestions?
Found this old thread from 2006.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=600  Hope it helps.
Should have dug into the vault first.  Thanks Maverick!
No prob, I searched google and thats what showed up   .
